title: Add api.airforce models: Imagen 3 & Grok Imagine Video
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Air Support Incoming
gist.blurb: We've integrated api.airforce to bring you Google's Imagen 3 and xAI's Grok Imagine Video. High-quality pixels and motion are just a prompt away.
gist.summary: Integrated api.airforce as a new provider, adding support for Google Imagen 3 image generation and xAI Grok Imagine Video generation.
gist.impact: Users can now generate high-quality images using `model='imagen'` and videos using `model='grok-video'`.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a pilot. Since the provider is 'api.airforce', an aviation theme is perfect. The bee wears aviator goggles and flies a cute pixel plane, delivering 'payloads' of art (images) and movies (video reels).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot wearing a tiny aviator helmet and goggles, flying a cute round pixelated airplane through fluffy clouds. The plane is trailing colorful pixel sparkles and dropping parachutes carrying canvases and film reels. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and sky blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Nostalgic but beautiful.
